BMM.F.summary: BrÃ¼der Mannesmann Aktiengesellschaft engages in the trading of hand tools and fittings. The company offers electrical tools fittings for environmental and supply engineering, as well as industrial applications. It serves the wholesale, hardware stores and associations, mail order, fresh water supply, sanitation, and gas supply markets. The company was founded in 1750 and is based in Remscheid, Germany.

FIE.DE.summary: Fielmann Aktiengesellschaft invests in and operates optical and hearing aid businesses. The company manufactures, distributes, and retails visual aids and other optical products, including glasses, frames, lenses, sunglasses, contact lenses and accessories, and various merchandise, as well as hearing aids and accessories. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 776 stores, including 602 in Germany, 43 in Switzerland, 38 Austria, 20 in Poland, 27 in Italy, 28 in Slovenia, 3 in Luxembourg, and 15 in the rest of Europe. The company also 50 smaller locations in Eastern Europe. Fielmann Aktiengesellschaft also offers its products through online stores. The company is headquartered in Hamburg, Germany. Fielmann Aktiengesellschaft is a subsidiary of Korva SE.

USE.F.summary: Beate Uhse AG, through its subsidiaries, provides adult lifestyle products. It offers love toys, lingerie, and wellness products through retail shops, catalogues, mailings, e-commerce, and wholesale distribution channels. The company operates 96 shops in 5 European countries. It also provides adult entertainment through online portals, such as MovieOn, HotcamsOn, PrivatPorno, and EnjoyOn in various languages. Beate Uhse AG markets and sells its products primarily under the Beate Uhse, Pabo, Adam & Eve, and Christine le Duc brands. The company was founded in 1946 and is based in Hamburg, Germany.

WFA.F.short_name: WENG FINE ART AG NA O.N.
WFA.F.summary: Weng Fine Art AG operates as an art dealer in Europe and the United States. It offers paintings, sculptures, works on papers, and prints. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Monheim am Rhein, Germany.
